phrases: 1 What God gave me... 2 I Do not Understand 3 Boy E Girl B 4 A Small Time 5 LOVE power A to Z 6 Setsuna Yui 7 Fourberty
Aoki Kou Hiramaru Kazuya Arai Kisaku Ashirogi Mutou Niizuma Eiji Fukuda Shinta Akina Aiko Hachihonki Hachirou
The participants of the Leaders Fest are...
Arai, Eiji, Aoki, Hiramaru, and us.
The deadline will change depending on what spot we are in,
but since we also have PCP to deal with, how far in advance should we prepare the manuscript?
Will you let me handle this one-shot?
I want to see how far I can get by myself.
Shuujin, you just said to Hattori that you are Ashirogi Mutou all the way.
That you did not want to cause me trouble by doing Rabuta.
I do not want to drag you down, either.
I do not want PCP's quality to suffer because of this one-shot.
I will just do as much as I can.
With PCP still running, you will work on Rabuta, and I will handle the one-shot's storyboard.
If we can pull this off, we will expand our horizons.
Ashirogi Mutou will become something greater!
Even if we are working on different manga, we are still Ashirogi Mutou!
A special one-shot with center color spread on page 45
A special one-shot with center color spread on page 45
Original work: Kido Takaaki Artist: Shiratori Shun
Original work: Kido Takaaki Artist: Shiratori Shun
ano ne moshimo i am about to sugu ni kimi no moto he to
Hey, if I could go to where you are right now
ikeru naraba kono koe ga nakunattemo ii ya
then I could accept losing my voice
mezasu basho ga amari ni mo tooku
The goals I have set myself seem impossible to reach,
boku wa mou michi ni mayoisou da
and I feel lost on my path
kowareta jishaku wo ate ni shiteru n da
I am relying on a broken compass and hiding in another's shadow
dareka no kage ni kakurete sa
If we keep letting go of some things in order to find something else,
then I am convinced we can never grow up
tsuzukete mo kitto bokura wa otona ni wa narenai
You two were full of energy last week!
I cannot think of anything besides Rabuta and PCP.
And Mashiro is trying to come up with another story.
Mashiro is also working on two manga?
What should I do for the one-shot...?
Hey, I am going out for a bit.
After my uncle died, all I did was sit at home playing video games.
And after I decided to be a manga artist with Shuujin, all I have done aside from school is bury myself in manga.
I have never done anything out of the ordinary.
Unlike Shuujin, sci-fi or mystery is impossible for me.
And unlike Fukuda and Shiratori, I do not really have any hobbies.
It can only be one thing!
Shiratori, make sure you visit your parents!
Mashiro, you should at least say goodbye to them!
It is the last time you will see them this year!
Are you still thinking about what to do for the one-shot?
If so, I can think of some ideas
Once an idea hits you, the rest comes quickly!
Wh-What are you going to do?
That is not Ashirogi Mutou's style!
How did you end up picking a love story?!
Because the thing I like most is Azuki.
At first, they simply gaze at the person they like.
It starts with him wondering, Does that girl like me?...
He is off in his own world now.
It is rare to find a romantic who loves as earnestly as Saikou does.
I want to compete with this!
I will make this into a storyboard.
Finally, we have got the first chapter of Rabuta in the bag.
We only need two more chapters to submit it to the serialization committee.
But since we have also got PCP to worry about, I have to get it done before New Year's.
You are on break until January 11th, right?
Yeah, and the New Year's party is on the 12th.
Takagi, we could shoot for the April committee instead of the February one, if you would like.
I did put on that big show in front of your mom, after all.
So if you do not go to the New Year's party, you could pull it off, right?
Well, we kind of have to go to that...
Um, I will go home and make a clean copy of chapter one!
I can picture the guy's point of view by comparing it with my own,
I will think of it on my own.
You are probably styling the heroine after her anyways, right?
Asking Azuki something like that would be too embarrassing!
I will be here every day until the storyboard's completed, so feel free to ask me for advice.
The storyboard for chapter two of Rabuta is not done, either.
Are we really going to the New Year's party in this kind of mood?
It might actually cheer us up.
You said there was no point in entering the Leader's Fest, you bastard!
There is no need for you to enter!
So why did Ashirogi and Master Niizuma, whose manga are more popular than GIRI, enter anyways?
Look, it is both of the Jack Girls.
It looks like all of you are entering the Leader's Fest.
Why do not you rank us while you are at it?
Chief, Fukuda was talking about entering the Leader's Fest...
Hey, do not get in my way!
You are getting ahead of yourself!
You could at least rank us privately!
Let us do as Fukuda suggests.
After all the one-shots have run, we will put out a survey so the readers can vote on which one they liked best.
Aoki and I are planning on a love story.
It is just that we were also
This time, I will also enter with a manga about love conquering all!
Mashiro was really cool when he came to take away his girlfriend!
I will write something like that!
These are supposed to be shounen manga, but these guys...
I will do a love story, too!
All the authors participating in the Leader's Fest will compete with love stories.
I was just thinking about doing a shounen manga version of Kimi ni Todoke...
Actually, back when I was a contributor, I did love comedies all the time.
It is not the Super Leader's Fest...
It is the Super Leader's Love Fest.
A competition to see who can create the best love story?
I am stepping outside to make a call!
You have been aware of me since 4th grade, right?
Mashiro, why are you asking about this?
Seven authors will publish love stories, and they will all be ranked.
I think it was love at first sight.
I liked you after taking just one look at you.
L-Love at first sight... what was it about me that you fell for?
Love at first sight does not follow any rhyme or reason.
The atmosphere that emanated from you... it fit me perfectly.
I will make this one-shot great!
Kengo is watching me, like I thought.
Kengo is watching me, just like I thought!
She realized that I am watching her!
She realized that I am watching her!
She realized that I am watching her!
Kengo is watching me, like I thought.
I know she will look at me again.
She will look at me again...
If I turn around and our eyes meet...
If I turn around and our eyes meet...
I have to be brave and not look away!
This is the moment our first crush became love.
This is the moment our first crush turned into love.
It really is a love story!
Actually, Mashiro came up with this one.
That is why it has a different style than normal.
Personally, I think it is good,
but I cannot predict how Jack readers will respond to this kind of outlook on love.
It is worth a shot, though.
I think there are some parts that need polishing, but let us go with this.
Now, Takagi, show me chapter two of Rabuta.
Peace is not acting like a dog anymore.
Takagi, I know you are good at advancing the story by having the characters think deeply about things,
but this time, that is working against you.
I am not saying he needs to think completely like a dog, but you at least need to simplify his feelings.
I will start again from scratch.
And now, I have a message for you.
the 50th chapter of PCP will be getting a front-page color spread to commemorate its one-year anniversary.
But it is still great to hear!
Your contract price and the per-manuscript payments will also be raised come February.
Payment is per page, so 19 pages, four times a month, would equal...
Also, the second drama CD has been confirmed.
This Azuki Miho that you recommended is now pretty popular.
She is gotten a lot of work since then.
Your first anniversary will also be celebrated at the serialization awards ceremony.
We really made it to a year.
I am amazed at how you can write three works simultaneously.
Doing a bunch of stuff at once is fun!
Why is it okay for you to do that, but not okay for Takagi to write the story for Rabuta Peace?
I am talking about what you said before!
It is true that Takagi only wrote the story.
That is not what I mean.
Rabuta Peace is by Shiratori Shun.
You do not necessarily have to make the February serialization committee, right?
Shuujin, let us both do our best!
I am the one who practically has to start from scratch.
Do not act like this does not involve you.
We are going to release this as an Ashirogi Mutou manga.
You may say that, but you did all the work on that one.
What I am working on is Shiratori Shun's story.
Can you say that this is Ashirogi Mutou?
Are we going to be okay?
Normally, would not we both be desperately working on that one-shot?
PCP will not become an anime.
Even so, if I work hard on this and Rabuta becomes an anime, would that make you happy?
I guess I was selfish for wanting to start another manga besides PCP so we could get an anime adaptation.
That is not what I am saying!
If you really want an anime adaptation, what we are doing now is strange!
I am telling you to be more selfish!
Just because you are frustrated with your work does not mean you can take it out on Mashiro!
Shiratori, I cannot write Rabuta unless I observe dogs up close.
It makes sense to be with Peace when he is writing Rabuta.
Are you really okay with that?
Do you really think it is a good thing for him to write Rabuta?
It is not right for me to stop Shuujin from broadening his abilities as an author.
If he does, it will improve Ashirogi Mutou as well.
But what will you do if it does not?
What if Rabuta does well, and he works on that full time?
Even if that happens, Shuujin would not do anything to hurt Ashirogi Mutou.
Taking care of a dog must be pretty hard.
You have to play with him and take him for walks every day.
The toughest part is paying for his food.
Dogs can tell what you are feeling from your expression.
They know when you tell a lie, too.
I guess the manga you made is not so far from reality.
Otherwise, I would not have been able to come up with Rabuta Peace.
Akito did not come to the studio today, either.
He is been gone all week!
And today's the meeting and the deadline for turning in your manuscript.
Oh, is it time for your regular love letter from Miho?
I will discuss PCP outside with Hattori.
He does not feel like coming?
And he is just sending a text instead of calling in person!
He is being thorough about this.
You would better not involve yourself in this.
Takagi told me he would meet me to discuss PCP one-on-one,
and to meet you later at your studio to discuss the one-shot.
I have something to talk to you about.
I would like to quit this assistant job at the end of the week.
If Takagi is really aiming for a serialization, I think I should stop being an assistant.
I will start looking for a replacement.
And Kaya, is it really okay with you?
That Takagi wants to stay over at my place for a while to observe Peace, I mean.
He did not tell me that!
You should let Takagi do what he wants.
Just think about making Rabuta better,
and do not worry about me.
Because you and I are about to become rivals.
Does he want to work with Shiratori now?
No, I have no time to worry about him.
I have to make the manga for the Love Fest!
You have worked hard on this over the years.
Tell me what to do during my tea date with Aoki!
I will help you out in exchange for a good storyboard for the one-shot.
The protagonist is convinced he is so unpopular...
It is the story of a boy who falls in love with an angel.
That is just like you, Aoki.
You guys have any love experience?
I was the Romeo of Hiroshima!
You are already done with the manuscript?
What is with this character design?!
The final climax is not quite there.
It just is not expressed well.
But everyone is already done except for you and Fukuda.
So this is the limit of what I can do alone...
I have the image in my head, but I do not know how to express it through dialogue.
Hattori, today is the serialization committee, right?
If you are worried about Rabuta, I can call you with the results.
I will redo my storyboard and send it to you again.
They should have long since finished with the storyboard for the committee.
So why are not you here, Shuujin?
Go ahead and do Rabuta, I said.
I turned in my manuscript yesterday.
I helped out with chapters two and three of the serialization storyboard,
but he did chapters four through seven himself.
Rabuta Peace is a manga by Shiratori Shun, you know.
Shiratori had the talent to write the story all along.
With a short training camp, he was able to do it.
So you stayed over to Shiratori's place to make him independent?
Shiratori and Hattori both gave the green light on going forward without me.
You said you wanted me to do Rabuta, but I am not that skilled.
I am fine with just Ashirogi Mutou's manga.
Now I can concentrate on PCP and the one-shot.
Let us take the top spot in the Leader's Fest!
This is the end of Ashirogi Mutou!
It finally devolved into a fist fight!
You guys are too timid for that.
We were both trying to cover for each other, but ended up wasting time and effort going in weird directions.
Now we have cleared the air.
Let us go back to the studio and work on that storyboard for the Love Fest.
For starters, I think we should give the protagonist a friend who makes wisecracks.
Otherwise, the story between the protagonist and the heroine drags on and the setting stagnates...
In the end, Aoki won it.

Aoki Kou Hiramaru Kazuya Arai Kisaku Ashirogi Mutou Niizuma Eiji Fukuda Shinta Akina Aiko Hachihonki Hachirou
But we did expand our horizons as Ashirogi Mutou.
Let us take our time, work on PCP,
and make our next manga into an anime.
The times when I fight and struggle and dream
katachi ni suru kono shunkan ga suki sa
katachi ni suru kono shunkan ga suki sa
of all the things I want in life is the best
tatakau you na te wo tsunagu you na
tatakau you na te wo tsunagu you na
That is when I feel the bond between us and our strength to fight
Our view of the world overlaps and stimulates us
dakara motto migakou jibun rashiku arou
dakara motto migakou jibun rashiku arou
Let us polish ourselves, be more like how we should be
The future can be found on the path we walk
My comrades believe in different things than me
yuzurenai kore kara mo kokoro no mama susumou yo
yuzurenai kore kara mo kokoro no mama susumou yo
I cannot give up on it, I have to do what my heart commands me to do
I have got the unbending pride
to run to the top now
hisshi nanda yo suki dakara suki wo mune ni susumu n da
hisshi nanda yo suki dakara suki wo mune ni susumu n da
This is my only choice, this is what I love and this is what I will do
donna ashita ga matteru ka shiranai
donna ashita ga matteru ka shiranai
I do not know what tomorrow will be like
But I know that tomorrow, again,
we will do our best to get by
Let us hurry up and start your new serialization.
I want happiness more than a new series!
I will do something about it.
Next time: Commemorative Photo Shoot and Classroom.
My dream is to be joined with Aoki!
